transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. You ride in me to go places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I am often red, blue, or yellow
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Your family might have one
🔑 You need a key to start me

transport.question: I go choo-choo and travel on tracks. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I can be very long
📣 I have a loud whistle
🧑‍✈️ A conductor drives me

transport.question: I float on the water and help you cross the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am bigger than a bathtub
⚓ I need an anchor to stay still
🧭 Pirates used to sail on me

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I have wings
☁️ I fly high above the clouds
💺 People sit in seats inside me

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You wear a helmet when riding me
🔔 I have a bell to ring
🛣️ You can ride me on a path

transport.question: I'm a big vehicle that takes many kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I am often yellow
🛑 I have a stop sign that comes out
🧑‍🏫 A driver makes sure you get to school safely

transport.question: I am like a car, but I can carry many things. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I am bigger than a car
🚚 I deliver things to stores
🚧 You might see me at a construction site

transport.question: I fly in the sky but not as fast as an airplane. I have a spinning blade on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one place
🏥 Sometimes I'm used to rescue people
🚨 I make a whopping sound

transport.question: I help you drive on ice and snow. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I attach to the wheels of a car
⛓️ I am made of metal
🚗 They help prevent the car from skidding

transport.question: I go to space, far away from Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very, very fast
👨‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me
🧑‍🔬 Scientists use me to explore the universe

plant.question: I am green and grow from the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am short.
🐄 You see me in a field with animals.
⚽ You can play on me.

plant.question: I have petals and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I can be many different colors.
🐝 I help bees make honey.
🌷 People give me as gifts.

plant.question: I grow on a tree and am red, yellow, or green. You can eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White liked me.
🌳 I grow in an orchard.
🥧 People make pies with me.

plant.question: I am tall and have a trunk. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 You can climb me, carefully!
🍁 I lose my leaves in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels love to climb up me.

plant.question: I am long and orange and grow underground. Rabbits like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny loves me.
🌱 You pull me out of the ground.
👀 I help you see better.

plant.question: I am a seed that grows in a pod. You can eat me or plant me. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am often green.
🥣 I can be used to make soup.
🌱 I grow in a pod.

plant.question: I have sharp thorns and beautiful flowers. I am a symbol of love. What am I?

hints.text: 🥀 I come in many colours, including red.
💘 You give me to someone you like.
🌵 Be careful of my pointy parts.

plant.question: I am big and round and grow on a vine. My flesh is red and juicy, and I have black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I'm often eaten in the summer.
☀️ I'm mostly water.
🏖️ People like to eat me on the beach.

plant.question: I'm a tall, strong grass, and I give you something yummy to eat when I'm ripe. You can make bread out of me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I grow in fields.
🍞 I can be ground into flour.
🦸 I am used to make cereal

plant.question: I am a big, strong tree that gives us nuts in the fall. Squirrels love to hide them for the winter. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 My nuts are round.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels are always digging near me.
